title: Trump nominee to lead whistleblower office withdraws after racist texts – US politics live
summary: Paul Ingrassia has withdrawn his nomination, citing a lack of sufficient Republican support. He expressed disappointment over not having enough votes to proceed. The announcement indicates challenges in securing party consensus for his candidacy.

title: Australia news live: new-look Melbourne rail stations revealed; PM’s plane makes unplanned stop due to crew member’s medical emergency
summary: Sure! Please provide the news content you'd like summarized.

title: Sydney set for ‘blistering’ weather as record heat shifts east and winds forecast to blast southern Australia
summary: Temperatures in Melbourne's CBD are projected to hit 39°C, while heavy rain and damaging winds of up to 130 km/h are anticipated along Victoria’s south-west coast. The severe weather conditions are expected to pose risks to public safety and infrastructure. Residents are advised to prepare for potential disruptions.

title: Palestinians in Gaza with Australian visas remain trapped as Israel keeps borders closed
summary: Perth resident Ahmed Abumarzouq is deeply concerned for his two nephews stranded in a conflict zone. Despite a declared ceasefire, they remain unable to escape the war-ravaged territory. Abumarzouq is seeking ways to help them find safety amidst the ongoing turmoil.

title: ‘A perfect coincidence’: rare red lightning captured in New Zealand skies
summary: A rare phenomenon called red lightning, which lasts only a millisecond, has been reported. This unusual atmospheric occurrence is seldom seen by the naked eye. Its rarity makes it a noteworthy subject for meteorological study.
